Sentencas: In this paper, we re-assess the use of Raman spectroscopy as an in situ method to monitor the sulfidation of SOFC (solid oxide fuel cell) anode-based materials.
Titulo: In situ Raman and optical characterization of H2S reaction with Ni-based anodes for SOFCs

Sentencas: The technique allows studying in situ kinetics of the sulfidation of nickel at low temperature (up to 500 degrees C).
Titulo: In situ Raman and optical characterization of H2S reaction with Ni-based anodes for SOFCs

Sentencas: A severe poisoning happens at 500 degrees C with a layer of Ni3S2 covering the entire pellet surface.
Titulo: In situ Raman and optical characterization of H2S reaction with Ni-based anodes for SOFCs

Sentencas: At higher temperatures, optical microscopy helps to observe in situ the formation and growth of nickel sulfide crystals for the first time.
Titulo: In situ Raman and optical characterization of H2S reaction with Ni-based anodes for SOFCs

Sentencas: The crystals' growths observed in situ strongly suggest the diffusion of nickel toward sulfide species.
Titulo: In situ Raman and optical characterization of H2S reaction with Ni-based anodes for SOFCs

Sentencas: A reaction between H2S and CGO was clearly observed at 750-790 degrees C. (C) 2015
Titulo: In situ Raman and optical characterization of H2S reaction with Ni-based anodes for SOFCs
